bioAsHtml: Yann has been working on Spring support in IntelliJ IDEA for six years. Before joining JetBrains, he spent a decade on (web) applications for a large variety of customers and trades as well as developing a number of plugins for the IDE. When he’s not coding, you’ll probably find him in the woods walking his dog or playing the piano.

acceptedTalks.title: Just one more thing with Spring in IntelliJ IDEA

bio: Yann has been working on Spring support in IntelliJ IDEA for six years. Before joining JetBrains, he spent a decade on (web) applications for a large variety of customers and trades as well as developing a number of plugins for the IDE. When he’s not coding, you’ll probably find him in the woods walking his dog or playing the piano.
